name: Game of Khans
description:
Welcome, GREAT KHAN!

- Discover the tribes of the vast green steppe.
- Earn the trust of their handsome chieftains.
- Fall in love with their beautiful daughters.

Game of Khans explores the ancient nomadic cultures of the central Asian Steppe with a fresh new perspective, so you can experience life, love and loss in this beautiful historical fantasy. You take on the role of a rising Khan, destined to build the largest undivided empire that the world has ever known, spanning Asia, Europe, and everything in-between! The legacy you leave behind will be remembered for a thousand, thousand years – but will your name be loved, hated, or feared?

- Command the might of the MONGOL HORDE!
- Seek strategy from HANDSOME ADVISORS!
- Court and romance your BEAUTIFUL WIVES!
- Diversify your lineage of SONS and DAUGHTERS!
- Build your cities to FLOURISH and PROSPER!
- Dominate old dynasties and DICTATE TERMS!
